roleset.name: decorate or add details to
roleset.note: EMBROIDER-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick based on ECTB 2. Comparison with 'engrave' and 'emboss'. Member of VNcls build-26.1, image_impression-25.1. (from embroider.01-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: Before the introduction of cloth and steel needles, [aborigines]-9 used bone needles and citrus thorns [*]-9 to embroider patterns onto ramie cloth.
